      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  PropagatingConfigurationObserver
      This extension to ConfigurationObserver allows the configuration to propagate to the children of the current ConfigurationObserver.

      The default scheduler.
      class  SimpleRpcServer

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中ConfigurationObserver的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  Region
      Region is a subset of HRegion with operations required for the Coprocessors.
      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CompactSplit
      Compact region on request and then run split if appropriate
      class  HMobStore
      The store implementation to save MOBs (medium objects), it extends the HStore.
      class  HRegion
      Regions store data for a certain region of a table.
      class  HRegionServer
      HRegionServer makes a set of HRegions available to clients.
      class  HStore
      A Store holds a column family in a Region.
      class  RSRpcServices
      Implements the regionserver RPC services.

      实现ConfigurationObserver的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer
      GroupBasedLoadBalancer, used when Region Server Grouping is configured (HBase-6721) It does region balance based on a table's group membership.
